scripts.add-games: npm run refresh-data-index && ncd scummvm/build-emscripten && node ../../scripts/build-add_games.js
scripts.package-files: cd scummvm && cp build-emscripten/scummvm.html build-emscripten/index.html && cp AUTHORS build-emscripten/ && cp COPYING build-emscripten/ && cp LICENSES/* build-emscripten/ && cp COPYRIGHT build-emscripten/ && cp NEWS* build-emscripten/ && cp README* build-emscripten/
